entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60

SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
